attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Gave me coronavirus as soon as I opened the app and now my reindeer won’t stop using my sewing machine to get to the office supply store.

attributes.title: a disappointment
attributes.review: i downloaded to see my favorite cheeto man baby but it was just so terrible filled with propaganda and lies and fake news. i wish this app could be put on an island and have a wall built around it. terrible job, d man.  terrible job. let baron do it next time 🤬🥰🥵🧞‍♀️🔮

attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: this app will track you.. please don’t get this app they will steal money and know where you live... plus super racist 😫 hate it here 😣

attributes.title: I CANT BELIEVE THIS
attributes.review: I downloaded this app ready to keep updated on our president. But to my horror trump showed up at my house and stole my dog😡😡🤬THEN HE STARTED SINGING GABBIE HANNAHS RAP VERSE. It was so bad my ear drums busted 😔I had to get surgery and now I’m in debt 😭😢😭

attributes.title: Stinky
attributes.review: This app is so bad when I opened the app my phone started smoking and it stared to smell like rotten cheese puffs but I guess Trummy does resemble a cheese puff so they got that right

attributes.review: Idk what I expected from little bunker boy but it was disappointing to say the least.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is horrible they stole my Mac n cheese. And when I downloaded it my phone started glitching and I got a virus.

attributes.title: The worst app in the world
